content:
Terms and Conditions

Last updated: January 10, 2025

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Our Service.

Interpretation and Definitions

Interpretation

The words with capital letters have defined meanings. These definitions apply whether they are in singular or plural.

Definitions

For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions:

  • Affiliate means any company that is directly or indirectly controlling, controlled by, or under common control with a party.
  • Country refers to: California, United States
  • Company (referred to as "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our") refers to DeliNova Express LLC, 1234 Maple Street, Sunnydale, CA 94001.
  • Device means any electronic device like a computer, phone, or tablet that can access the Service.
  • Service refers to the Website.
  • Terms and Conditions (or "Terms") means this agreement regarding the use of the Service.
  • Third-party Social Media Service means any content or service from third parties that may be displayed or linked within the Service.
  • Website refers to DeliNova, accessible at https://delinova.net
  • You means the person or entity using the Service.

Acknowledgment

These Terms govern the use of this Service and form the agreement between You and the Company.

By using the Service, You agree to be bound by these Terms. If You disagree with any part, You must not use the Service.

You must be at least 18 years old to use this Service.

You must also agree to the Privacy Policy, which explains how we handle your personal data.

Links to Other Websites

Our Service may link to third-party websites not controlled by us. We are not responsible for their content or practices.

We recommend reading their terms and policies carefully.

Termination

We may terminate Your access without notice if You breach these Terms.

Limitation of Liability

Our total liability shall not exceed the amount You paid via the Service or $50 if You haven't purchased anything.

We are not liable for indirect or incidental damages even if we were advised of the possibility.

"AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" Disclaimer

The Service is provided "AS IS" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free Service.

Governing Law

The laws of the State of California, excluding conflict rules, govern these Terms.

Disputes Resolution

If You have any issues, please contact us to try resolving it informally.

For EU Users

If You live in the EU, you retain rights granted under your countryâ€™s laws.

United States Legal Compliance

You confirm You are not on any U.S. government sanctions list or in a restricted country.

Severability and Waiver

Severability

If any provision is invalid, the rest remain in effect.

Waiver

Not enforcing a right does not mean waiving it.

Translation Interpretation

In case of any translation discrepancy, the English version shall prevail.

Changes to These Terms and Conditions

We may update these Terms. Material changes will be notified 30 days in advance.

By continuing to use the Service, You agree to the new Terms.

Contact Us

If you have any questions, contact us:

  • By email: support@delinova.net
